description:
EF Collection is looking for a Production Coordinator to join our team! This candidate is the strategic and structural backbone of our production process and will work closely with our Production Manager to receive and allocate goods, manage all new samples and keep our inventory system accurate and clean. This is a dynamic, detail oriented, and fluid position with the following responsibilities:


Receiving & Allocation of Goods:

  • Receive all finished goods from various vendors
  • Allocate finished product to specific online and wholesale orders
  • Print and organize tags for all new SOs


Inventory Management & Repairs:

  • SKU creation & maintenance in our inventory system.
  • Product transfers between warehouses when needed
  • Pull product for weekly photoshoots
  • Keep new collection samples organized
  • Keep track of all repairs.
  • Weekly drop off of repairs to various local jewelers.


Production:

  • Maintain cross-functional design calendar from design inception to physical approved samples. *Ensure all deadlines and deliveries are met.
  • Maintain / Update Line sheets
  • Lead weekly production WIP meetings
  • Understanding the profitability of product costs to achieve margin goals.
  • Develop & implement policies and procedures to enhance dept. operations and efficiencies.


Requirements:

1-2 years production experience

Detail Oriented

Organized

Team Player

Good with systems

Strong written and verbal communication



In-person role at our West Hollywood showroom

Compensation BOE.
